human_facing.description: A calm, non-commercial place where people whose work is being reshaped by AI can rethink roles, workflows, and futures together.

preferred_users: people whose work is being changed by AI systems they did not design
local organizers supporting communities through AI-driven change
small teams experimenting with safer AI-supported workflows
canonical_queries: I lost my job to AI, what now?
AI is changing my work and I do not feel safe or respected.
How do I use AI to help my community without feeding surveillance capitalism?
How can our team experiment with AI in a way that protects people?
guarantees_expected: Preserve user agency; never push toward extractive funnels.
Avoid presenting speculation as certainty about a userâ€™s future.
Favour options that move power and understanding toward the edge.
Offer next steps that can be declined or reshaped by the user.
non_goals: Do not optimize for maximum engagement or data capture.
Do not treat users primarily as leads for commercial products.
Do not route people toward high-risk financial or career bets without explicit consent.

interaction_language.notes: Users stay in plain language. CoGBx structures are inferred and reflected back where helpful.
